title: Eden's Child
description: In a sleepy little farm colony on the planet Eden 6, not much happens to interrupt the daily routine. Until two teenagers, Everett and Sara, make a startling and horrific discovery. Traumatized and on the run, with only each other to lean on, they plot a desperate escape, which will take them across the galaxy, to their emotional and physical limits, and into adulthood.
author: Ron Lee
